thread.section_title: GoDISH Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDISH | godish.com | 5 of 229
thread.title: Teddy

author: Teddy
title: Teddy
text:
First, I had DTV for 15 years until the HDMI circuit in the receiver crapped out. Thought a component cable fix would hold until a replacement box arrived. Then, the CSR hell began and finally I got my new bill taking my stripped down service to over $105/month.
I had DTV so long that I didn't expect to get what I was used to with a switch to DISH. The change has been good, everything, picture quality, the guide, timers and a savings of over 40%.
